name: Coffee Run (itch) (SebasRez)
description:
Coffee Run!

You're a mug running through the streets of New York looking for as much coffee as you can take. Take all the coffee as fast as you can and drink it all even faster! 

Up/Left click to Jump and Down/Right click to fall fast.

Authors Note: I personally don't drink coffee but this is what I assume drinking coffee is like. 

Highscore: 843
